questions.question: What is the name of India’s first indigenously developed antibiotic targeting antimicrobial resistance (AMR)?
MeerKAT radio telescope, which was seen in the news, is located in which country?
Who among the following used the term computer worm for the first time?
The world’s largest solar tree in India has been developed by which institution?
Which technology giant is going to set up a Center of Excellence for AI (Artificial Intelligence) along with GeM?
National Sports Day 2025 in India is dedicated to which legendary player?
“Perfect 10” is the word used in Cricket for which performance?
questions.answer: Bowler taking 10 Wickets in an innings.

questions.question: Which hockey player received the Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award 2024?
